akn:section.akn:heading: Competitive energy supplier consumer awareness program.

akn:content.akn:p: The Office of the Peopleâ€™s Counsel shall establish a program to increase the awareness of District residents of the availability of services offered by competitive energy providers and the means by which to procure such services.

The Public Service Commission shall establish a program to increase the awareness of District residents of the availability of services offered by competitive energy providers and the means by which to procure such services.
